title.rendered: Value Education for kids from Central India Public School, Kapsi

content.rendered:
A value education workshop was conducted at Central India Public School, Near Baradwari Lake, Kapsi (Khurd), Bhandara Road, Nagpur under Smile Foundation’s Child for Child (CFC) programme. The Principal Mr. Rajendra Mishra and all the teachers, along with 600 students were sensitized during the workshop.

The school encourages admission of underprivileged children quite vehemently. The Principal requested Smile Foundation’s presence to be displayed in the premises throughout the year so that children and parents could be sensitized on a regular basis.

CFC has been designed for bringing children from both the worlds together, sensitising the privileged children about the life and aspiration of their less privileged counterparts and encouraging them for growing up as responsible citizens to build a better society.
